programme.title: 2024 ACC Football Championship: Clemson vs. SMU
programme.desc: Clemson takes home the title on a last-second field goal.

programme.title: 2024 ACC Women's Soccer Championship: North Carolina vs. Florida State
programme.desc: The Noles took home the conference title over the eventual-national champion Tar Heels.

programme.title: 2024 ACC Men's Soccer Championship: Clemson vs. Wake Forest
programme.desc: The Tigers and the Demon Deacons battle for the 2024 Championship title.

programme.title: 2025 ACC Baseball Championship: Clemson vs. North Carolina
programme.desc: The Tigers and the Tar Heels face off with the 2025 trophy on the line.

programme.title: 2025 ACC Softball Championship: Clemson vs. Florida State
programme.desc: The Tigers take on the Seminoles for the 2025 trophy.

programme.title: 2025 ACC Men's Lacrosse Championship: Syracuse vs. Duke
programme.desc: The Orange picked up its first ACC title since 2016 in a hard-fought win.

programme.title: 2025 ACC Women's Lacrosse Championship: Boston College vs. North Carolina
programme.desc: The Tar Heels clinched their 8th ACC title in a back-and-forth thriller.

programme.title: 2025 ACC MBB Championship: Louisville vs. Duke
programme.desc: Tournament MVP Kon Knueppel led the Blue Devils to another ACC Tournament title in Charlotte.

programme.title: 2025 ACC WBB Championship: Duke vs. NC State
programme.desc: Duke won its first ACC Tournament title since 2013 in a big second-half comeback over the Pack.
